primal.text: You are knocked unconscious for 1d6 hours. If you take any damage you must roll a d10. If the roll is above a 7 you wake up.
You must succeed a fortitude save against your own DC or take a major wound, taking a minor wound on a pass.
You cast lightning bolt, including yourself in the area of effect.
You cannot cast spells for 1d6 rounds.
A random creature within 30ft of you (including yourself) must succeed on a will save or be stunned for a minute. On each turn it can repeat the save, ending the stun on a success.
You summon an imp in a random square 10ft from you. This imp is hostile to any creature near it and disappears when dead or after an hour.
Everything within 15 ft. of you (including you) catches on fire, taking 1d10 damage every round until they or another creature use an action to put it out.
You take 1d12 sanity damage and have visions of tentacles.
Your next invocation costs double the number of spellcasting ability points.

Choose one of the following options 
 A) Flip a coin. On heads you can select an effect from this table. On tails the GM selects an effect. (GM Note: Pick a bad one) 
 B) Reroll this roll.
Every creature within 15 ft. of you regains 5 defence.
The next attack that hits you deals no damage.
A swarm of butterflies appears around you. This blocks line of sight in a 20 ft. radius around you. You are blinded.
You regain 1 defence at the start of every round for a minute.
Pick a creature within 30ft of you. The target must succeed on a fortitude save or be deafened for a minute. You can choose to target an empty square if you wish, creating a loud boom instead.
Pick a creature within 30ft of you. The creature has advantage on the next attack it makes within 1 minute.
The next invocation you cast costs half its usual cost.
You can select a target within 30ft. The target must succeed a fortitude save or take a minor wound. If you cause a wound in this manner you may heal one minor wound.
You instantly regain all your spent spellcasting ability points
